name: Farmers & Merchants Bank of Long Beach
description: Farmers & Merchants Bank of Long Beach (F&M Bank) is a community-focused financial institution that has been serving the needs of individuals and businesses in California since its founding in 1907. With a commitment to providing personalized banking services, F&M Bank offers a wide range of financial products including commercial and consumer loans, mortgages, deposit accounts, and wealth management services. The bank prides itself on its long-standing tradition of customer service excellence, emphasizing the importance of building lasting relationships within the communities it serves. F&M Bank operates a network of branches throughout Southern California, providing convenient access to banking services for both personal and business needs. The bank also leverages technology to enhance the customer experience, offering online banking and mobile app services that allow customers to manage their finances seamlessly. F&M Bank's mission is to empower clients through sound financial solutions, community involvement, and a dedication to ethical banking practices. As a trusted partner in financial growth, the bank aims to contribute positively to the economic well-being of its customers and the communities in which it operates.

seo.meta_title: Farmers & Merchants Bank of Long Beach | Community Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Farmers & Merchants Bank of Long Beach, a trusted community bank offering personal and business banking solutions, mortgages, and wealth management services.

faq.question: What services does F&M Bank provide?
faq.answer: F&M Bank provides personal and business banking services, loans, mortgages, and wealth management solutions.

faq.question: Where is F&M Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: F&M Bank is headquartered in Long Beach, California, USA.
